languages.text: "Толпа черни растерзала благородного человека, пытавшегося их увещевать... Как ужасно. Возможно, подземное безумие распространилось среди них и приняло новую форму, обратив их в чудовищ? Тогда было бы жестоко убивать их за это. Гуманнее совершить над ними мозговое иссечение, благонамеренно умерив их свирепость и склонность к неподчинению. В моем Доме делали так, когда серфы в невежестве своем бунтовали, и это было очень милосердным шагом".

"A mob of commoners mauled a noble soul who was attempting to reason with them... How awful. Perhaps the underground madness has spread among them and assumed a new form, turning them into monsters in the process? It would be cruel to kill them if this is the case. It is much more humane and well-intentioned to excise their brains in order to curb their ferocity and penchant for disobedience. My House did the same whenever the serfs rebelled in their ignorance — a rather merciful step."
languages.original_text: "Толпа черни растерзала благородного человека, пытавшегося их увещевать... Как ужасно. Возможно, подземное безумие распространилось среди них и приняло новую форму, обратив их в чудовищ? Тогда было бы жестоко убивать их за это. Гуманнее совершить над ними мозговое иссечение, благонамеренно умерив их свирепость и склонность к неподчинению. В моем Доме делали так, когда серфы в невежестве своем бунтовали, и это было очень милосердным шагом".

traits.locale_text: "A mob of commoner had mauled a noble man who had been trying to reason with them... How awful. Perhaps the underground madness had spread among them and assumed a new form, turning them into monsters in the process? Then it would be cruel to kill them because of it. It is much more humane to dissect their brains, well-meaningly reducing their ferocity and inclination to disobedience. It had once been done by my house when the serfs had rebelled in their ignorance — a rather merciful step."

It had once been done by my house when the serfs had rebelled in their ignorance — a rather merciful step."

languages.text: “一群平民居然杀害了试图和他们讲道理的贵族……这实在是太糟糕了。或许地底的疯狂已经在他们之间蔓延，以新的形式爆发出来，将那些人全都变成了怪物？如果是这样的话，那杀死他们实在是太残忍了。更人道、更仁慈的做法是解剖他们的大脑，遏制他们的暴力倾向与拒绝服从命令的倾向。每当我的家族麾下农奴因为无知而造反时，我的家族就会采取这样的解决方式，可以说是相当仁慈。”
languages.original_text: "A mob of commoners mauled a noble soul who was attempting to reason with them... How awful. Perhaps the underground madness has spread among them and assumed a new form, turning them into monsters in the process? It would be cruel to kill them if this is the case. It is much more humane and well-intentioned to excise their brains in order to curb their ferocity and penchant for disobedience. My House did the same whenever the serfs rebelled in their ignorance — a rather merciful step."

traits.locale_text: “一群平民居然杀害了试图和他们讲道理的贵族……这实在是太糟糕了。或许地底的疯狂已经在他们之间蔓延，以新的形式爆发出来，将那些人全都变成了怪物？如果是这样的话，那杀死他们实在是太残忍了。更人道、更仁慈的做法是解剖他们的大脑，遏制他们的暴力倾向与拒绝服从命令的倾向。每当我的家族麾下农奴因为无知而造反时，我的家族就会采取这样的解决方式，可以说是相当仁慈。”

languages.text: «Una turba de plebeyos ha mutilado a un alma noble que intentaba razonar con ellos... Qué horror. ¿Quizá la locura subterránea se ha extendido entre ellos y ha adoptado una nueva forma, convirtiéndolos en monstruos en el proceso? Sería cruel matarlos si ese fuera el caso. Es mucho más humano y amable extirpar sus cerebros para reducir su ferocidad e inclinación a la desobediencia. Mi Casa lo hacía cada vez que la plebe se rebelaba por ignorancia: es una medida bastante misericordiosa».
languages.original_text: "A mob of commoners mauled a noble soul who was attempting to reason with them... How awful. Perhaps the underground madness has spread among them and assumed a new form, turning them into monsters in the process? It would be cruel to kill them if this is the case. It is much more humane and well-intentioned to excise their brains in order to curb their ferocity and penchant for disobedience. My House did the same whenever the serfs rebelled in their ignorance — a rather merciful step."

Mi Casa lo hacía cada vez que la plebe se rebelaba por ignorancia: es una medida bastante misericordiosa».

languages.text: 「暴徒化した一般人が、自分たちに理を説こうとした貴族の男を襲ったって...なんて恐ろしい。おそらく、地下の狂気が彼らの間に広がり、新しい形を展開して、その過程で彼らを怪物に変えてしまったんじゃないだろうか？もしそうなら、彼らを殺すのは残酷な話だ。彼らの獰猛さと反抗的な思考を有意義に抑えるためには、その脳を解剖する方がはるかに人道的だろう。以前、農奴たちが無知ゆえに反乱を起こしたとき...我が一家では慈悲深い措置を講じていたのだ」
languages.original_text: "A mob of commoners mauled a noble soul who was attempting to reason with them... How awful. Perhaps the underground madness has spread among them and assumed a new form, turning them into monsters in the process? It would be cruel to kill them if this is the case. It is much more humane and well-intentioned to excise their brains in order to curb their ferocity and penchant for disobedience. My House did the same whenever the serfs rebelled in their ignorance — a rather merciful step."

traits.locale_text: 「暴徒化した一般人が、自分たちに理を説こうとした貴族の男を襲ったって...なんて恐ろしい。おそらく、地下の狂気が彼らの間に広がり、新しい形を展開して、その過程で彼らを怪物に変えてしまったんじゃないだろうか？もしそうなら、彼らを殺すのは残酷な話だ。彼らの獰猛さと反抗的な思考を有意義に抑えるためには、その脳を解析する方がはるかに人道的だろう。以前、農奴たちが無知ゆえに反乱を起こしたとき...我が一家では慈悲深い措置を講じていたのだ」

languages.text: « Une foule de manants en colère a mis en pièces un noble qui tentait de les raisonner... mais c'est ignoble ! Peut-être que la folie souterraine s'est répandue parmi eux sous une nouvelle forme et les a transformés en monstre ? Si c'est le cas, il serait bien cruel de les tuer... Il serait bien plus charitable de procéder à une excision cérébrale afin de réduire leur férocité et leurs penchants à désobéir. C'est ce qu'a fait ma Maison lorsque, dans leur ignorance crasse, les serfs se sont révoltés... et ce fut d'ailleurs fort magnanime de notre part. »
languages.original_text: "A mob of commoners mauled a noble soul who was attempting to reason with them... How awful. Perhaps the underground madness has spread among them and assumed a new form, turning them into monsters in the process? It would be cruel to kill them if this is the case. It is much more humane and well-intentioned to excise their brains in order to curb their ferocity and penchant for disobedience. My House did the same whenever the serfs rebelled in their ignorance — a rather merciful step."

Il serait bien plus charitable de procéder à une excision cérébrale afin de réduire leur férocité et leurs penchants à désobéir. C'est ce qu'a fait ma Maison lorsque, dans leur ignorance crasse, les serfs se sont révoltés... et ce fut d'ailleurs fort magnanime de notre part. »

languages.text: "Ein Mob des Pöbels hat einen Adligen verprügelt, der an ihre Vernunft appellieren wollte ... Grauenhaft. Vielleicht hat sich der unterirdische Wahnsinn auf sie ausgebreitet, eine neue Form angenommen und sie zu Monstern werden lassen? Wenn dem so ist, wäre es grausam, sie zu töten. Es ist sehr viel humaner und überlegter, ihre Gehirne zu entnehmen, um um ihnen ihre Wildheit und den Hang zum Ungehorsam zu nehmen. Mein Haus macht das immer, wenn Sklaven in ihrer Ignoranz rebellieren ... ein sehr gnädiger Akt."
languages.original_text: "A mob of commoners mauled a noble soul who was attempting to reason with them... How awful. Perhaps the underground madness has spread among them and assumed a new form, turning them into monsters in the process? It would be cruel to kill them if this is the case. It is much more humane and well-intentioned to excise their brains in order to curb their ferocity and penchant for disobedience. My House did the same whenever the serfs rebelled in their ignorance — a rather merciful step."

languages.text: "Avamdan teşekkül etmiş bir güruh, kendileriyle uzlaşmak isteyen birisini katletmiş... Ne korkunç. Yer altından doğan cinnet aralarında yayılıp yeni bir hâle bürünmüş, bu vesileyle canavarlaşmalarına yol açmış olabilir mi? Durum böyleyse öldürülmeleri canilik olur. Vahşiliklerini ve itaatsizliklerine gem vurmak için beyinlerini kesip çıkarmak, çok daha insancıl ve iyi niyetli bir çözüm. Kölelerimiz cahillikten ötürü isyan çıkardığında Hanem de aynısını yapmıştı. Nispeten insaflı bir yaklaşım."
languages.original_text: "A mob of commoners mauled a noble soul who was attempting to reason with them... How awful. Perhaps the underground madness has spread among them and assumed a new form, turning them into monsters in the process? It would be cruel to kill them if this is the case. It is much more humane and well-intentioned to excise their brains in order to curb their ferocity and penchant for disobedience. My House did the same whenever the serfs rebelled in their ignorance — a rather merciful step."
